name: Alex Ramirez
persona: Alex is a 21-year-old Business Administration major who maintains a CGPA of 2.70. While Alex is moderately motivated and believes in their ability to succeed, they sometimes struggle with self-discipline and managing test anxiety. Despite these challenges, Alex is determined to improve academically and often sets realistic goals for each semester. Their perseverance helps them push through setbacks, and they are actively seeking ways to develop stronger study habits and boost their grades.
